docs.text: Welcome to the KTech Knowledgebase! This knowledgebase is an accumulation of knowledge, tips, tricks, and notes that I have acquired over the years. Knowledgebase Information Source is on github Built with mkdocs Deployed to github pages Common Commands mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. mkdocs gh-deploy - Deploy the documentation to GitHub pages
